text: The Secret of the Chinese Carnation (; ) is a 1964 German French Italian crime movie directed by Rudolf Zehetgruber and is based on a novel by Louis Weinert- Wilton. It stars Paul Dahlke, Olga Schoberová, Dietmar Schönherr, Dominique Boschero, Klaus Kinski and was distributed by Constantin Film. == Other websites == * Category:1964 crime movies Category:German crime movies Category:French crime movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Prague Category:Movies directed by Rudolf Zehetgruber
title: The Secret of the Chinese Carnation
